2063890.name: Toggle Cube
2063890.description:
Toggle Cubes is a charming puzzle game that will test your strategic thinking as you guide little characters to collect all the stars in each level. With simple yet engaging mechanics, your mission is to toggle cubes on and off, creating pathways while avoiding tricky obstacles like monsters, fireballs, and spikes. Use keys and teleports wisely to help your characters reach their goals!

Featuring a cute isometric art style and a relaxing soundtrack, Toggle Cubes offers a delightful experience that can be enjoyed in one sitting. The controls are intuitive—whether you prefer clicking with your mouse, using a keyboard, or a gamepad—and the gameplay is accessible to players of all levels. The characters follow a predictable clockwise path, so it’s all about being smart with how and when you toggle the cubes. Need to sacrifice a few characters to complete a level? That’s part of the strategy! Even monsters can use keys and teleports, adding an extra layer of challenge.

Key Features:

  • Unique Puzzle Mechanics: Toggle cubes to guide your characters to collect all the stars.

  • Charming Art Style: Enjoy a cute, colorful, and isometric visual design.

  • Relaxing Soundtrack: A soothing soundtrack that complements the gameplay.

  • Varied Challenges: Avoid spikes, monsters, and fireballs while managing keys and teleports.

  • Accessible Gameplay: Simple controls via mouse, keyboard, or gamepad.

  • Achievements & Cloud Saves: Earn achievements and save your progress seamlessly.

Join the adventure and test your puzzle-solving skills in Toggle Cubes!
2063890.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 泰语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 越南语
